body_html:
@shiyemin If your bazel output directory is on NFS, rather than the local filesystem, the build might sometimes work, but very slowly. So it's possible that things just happened to work previously.

I.e. it's best to ensure your bazel output directory is on the local filesystem, to avoid these problems to begin with, and to have reasonable build times.

I'm closing this out, but feel free to comment or file a new issue if you run into further problems. Thanks!
